greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Compound filter: a(n) = T(A000010(n), A257993(n)), where T(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[(2 + (#1 + #2)^2 - #1 - 3 #2)/2 & @@ {EulerPhi@ n, Module[{i = 1}, While[! CoprimeQ[Prime@ i, n], i++]; i]}, {n, 74}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, May 04 2017 *)
program: from sympy import prime, primepi, gcd, totient
def T(n, m): return ((n + m)**2 - n - 3*m + 2)/2
def a(n): return T(totient(n), a257993(n)) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 05 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 04 2017
